channel.title: Productivity on Shreyas Ragavan
channel.description: Recent content in Productivity on Shreyas Ragavan

item.title: Searching the awesome-lists on github
item.description: I came upon the glorious awesome lists today on Github. These repositories can be viewed with a simple search on github. They contain all kinds of lists on all kinds of topics, and are curated. Beware! the number of lists and the number of items being covered are quite extensive. There are a lot of common grounds and topics between these lists. I wanted to search for a keyword through all these repositories.

item.title: Iosevka - an awesome font for Emacs
item.description: It’s well known that installing a SSD in place of the conventional Hard disk can breathe new life into very old machines. My mid 2010 Macbook Pro is one such example, being over 8 years old. 1 , 2 , 3 Before my foray into Emacs, I purchased applications like IAWriter (classic)4, Marked2, Texts (cross platform Mac/Windows) and also tried all the recommended apps for longer form writing. I am a fan of zen writing apps.
